Package client

Class ChatClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • ocsf.client.AbstractClient
      • client.ChatClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class ChatClient
extends AbstractClient
    xv This class overrides some of the methods defined in the abstract superclass in order to give more functionality to the client.

      • handleMessageFromServer

        public void handleMessageFromServer​(java.lang.Object msg)
        Description copied from class: AbstractClient
        Handles a message sent from the server to this client. This MUST be implemented by subclasses, who should respond to messages.
        Specified by:
        handleMessageFromServer in class AbstractClient
        Parameters:
        msg - the message sent.
